name: A Prototype of Walking on the Moon
name_original: A Prototype of Walking on the Moon
description:
Premise:

In the game, you are a cube on the moon. Just walk around and pick up things.

Controls:

Use mouse and left click to move the avatar, use keypad for moving the camera(8 is up, 2 is down, 4 is left and 6 is right. 0 for zoom out, 5 for zoom in)

G for pickinig up items. When you picking up an item, use arrow key (up and down) to switch items. For each item, you use W to wear, E for eat and space bar for use.

Inside the game, you can watch the rabbits walking and eatting, watch the suns growing. You can also pick up items to interact. For eample, if you pick up and eat the carrot, you will become bigger.
